content:
Users can only access the rooms they are invited to by admins. They can't create own rooms, folders or files.
<1>In {{agentSection}}: can view the AI agent results and shared chats if they were invited, but cannot create chats or modify the knowledge base.

comment.text: This key provides a description of the permissions for new users. It explains they can only access rooms they're invited to and have limited abilities within the AI agent section, appearing as informational text related to user access roles. Translators should focus on accurately conveying the restrictions placed on new users.
